subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cesc Fàbregas scored three goals in place of the injured Lionel Messi, powering Barcelona in a 5-0 thrashing of Mallorca in Spain’s top league.
snippet: Cesc Fàbregas scored three goals in place of the injured Lionel Messi, powering Barcelona in a 5-0 thrashing of Mallorca in Spain’s top league.
